title: Apple Tree Cafe
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers seasonal, fresh food mainly for vegetarians, vegans and gluten intolerant. Vegan and gluten free items are clearly marked. Has a selection of vegan and gluten free cakes also available for purchase. Breakfast served from 10am–12 noon and lunch from 12 noon–2pm. Car parking facilities also available. Open since May 2011 and located in Trevescan, just a half mile from Land’s End and Sennen.
streetAddress: Half a mile from Land's End and Sennen
